remarks: For each edge in a simple graph, there are two distinct vertices which are connected by this edge.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Dec-2017.)
statement:
usgrarnedg $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ Y e. ran E ) -> E. a e. V E. b e. V ( a =/= b /\ Y = { a , b } ) ) $.
$d E a b $.
$d V a b $.
$d Y a b $.
